=====================
JE + BO with spaces and pause
=====================

mi je   .   bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (word))
    (connective (jek_bo))
  (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))

=====================
JOI + BO with mixed case
=====================

mi JOI   bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (word))
    (connective (joi_bo))
  (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))

=====================
JOI + BO separated by many spaces
=====================

mi joi        bo do klama
---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (word))
    (connective (joi_bo))
  (selbri (tanru_unit (word)))))
